name: Adobe Lightroom Preview File
summary: Learn about .LRPREVIEW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Lightroom creates different size previews of original images. If there is a 1:1 preview available, the file can then be recovered as a JPG file, which will offer the same resolution as the original image.
The LRViewer application can directly browse previews and export them as JPG images. The "Extract Cached Images" plugin is only compatible with versions 2 and 4 of Adobe Lightroom.
NOTE: Lightroom was formerly known as Photoshop Lightroom.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Adobe Lightroom with the Extract Cached Image Previews plugin
